description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Battle through over 9000 levels in this original dungeon-crawler for the 360. Cut down enemies as a Warrior; overwhelm foes with magic as a Mage; or fill your pockets with gold while trying to survive as an Explorer
description.short: Battle through over 9000 levels in this original dungeon-crawler for the 360. Cut down enemies as a Warrior; overwhelm foes with magic as a Mage; or fill your pockets with gold while trying to survive as an Explorer
